title: modewei
author: modewei
created_time: July 22, 2022, 04:04:07 AMLast edit: July 23, 2022, 01:42:36 PM by modewei
content: The war and the epidemic have seriously damaged the world. At this time, Little Boy came here and wanted to build a healthy and orderly WEB3.0 world with peopleROAD MAP：Step 1Open LittleBoy NFT Mint at price of 0.0043BNB, first come first served.Step 2One billion initial tokens, 90% of which are based on LittleBoy NFT airdrop and 10% for LP.Step 3Open NFT Mint for miners, (NFT max supply: 60,000) each NFT requires 60,000 tokens. 95% of the Mint spend is destroyed instantly, 3% goes to the DAO fund and 2% goes to the team.Step 4Open NFT mining, each miner NFT mining 1000 tokens per day, of which 95% goes to the user, 3% goes to the DAO, 2% goes to the team. Every 2,592,000 blocks mining reward is halved.Twitter:@LittleBoy_WorldOff-topic: I am not the owner of this project, I am just a mint nft participant.

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Hello, I would like to promote your project on my Twitter & discord. If you are interested, please DM me.

comments.author: modewei
comments.body: Quote from: lightbit on July 22, 2022, 06:16:03 AMHello, I would like to promote your project on my Twitter & discord. If you are interested, please DM me.Hey, I don't own this project.But I don't think a community driven project like this can afford to pay for promotion.

comments.author: modewei
comments.body: Just now LittleBoy NFT's official Twitter feed @LittleBoy_World tweeted that they will give up LP ownership after LittleBoy's token is listed. Let LittleBoy go into full DAO governance.

comments.author: modewei
comments.body: Little Boy Second Hop:Miner NFT is about to begin. The prerequisite is that you must hold the Little Boy NFT.Miner NFT details：This is our upcoming miner NFT.Maximum supply: 60000.Each NFT can mine 1000 tokens per day. Rewards will be halved when a certain number of block heights are reached.
